headline: Why Nvidia earnings could be a sink-or-swim moment for this bull market
summary: The market rally has been broadening away from Big Tech and Nvidia, its leader. But at the same time, the chip company is still critical to the health of bull market.

headline: Billionaire Ray Dalio Sold 27% of Bridgewater's Stake in Nvidia and Is Piling Into 2 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stock-Split Stocks
summary: Dalio dumped more than 1.8 million shares of Wall Street's favorite artificial intelligence (AI) stock and respectively quadrupled and 10X'd Bridgewater's position in two other AI stock-split stocks.
